org.agilej.sparkle.route

Class AbstractRouteModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilej.sparkle.route.AbstractRouteModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RouteModule

    public abstract class AbstractRouteModule
extends Object
implements RouteModule
    A support class for RouteModules which reduces repetition and results in a more readable configuration. Simply extend this class and implement configure(), and call the inherited methods which mirror those found in Router. For example: 
         

     class MyRouteModule extends AbstractRouteModule{
         public void configure(){
             get("/item/{id}").to("items#show");
             post("/item/{id}").to("items#update");
         }
     }
